feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission clearly describes a working financial tool that accepts financial inputs, produces quantitative scenarios (monthly savings, return assumptions, percentages) and generates recommendations. The DISCOVER and IMPLEMENT evidence shows the app was built and functional; REFLECT shows meaningful financial interpretation, meeting the standards for a PASS.
- Integrate AI: The student shows clear, functional integration of AI (Google AI Studio) that produces both numeric analyses and visualizations and provides scenario-based recommendations, not just superficial labeling. The DISCOVER and IMPLEMENT evidence shows deliberate prompt engineering and output customization, and the REFLECT stage shows critical use of the AI outputs, supporting a thorough, value-adding integration.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "And so my project was a retirement planner."
"it asks for your current age, uh the age that you want to retire at, how much is currently in your savings, and your estimated yearly income."

"it will give you three um possible options for um saving ... the conservative route would be ... invest $8,000 ... about 65% of your income ... base ... save $5.7,000 per month ... optimistic ... requires $4,000 of monthly savings for 32% of the income per month."
criteria.driver_alignment: DISCOVER: Student defined the financial application (retirement planner) and required inputs.
criteria.reasoning: The submission clearly describes a working financial tool that accepts financial inputs, produces quantitative scenarios (monthly savings, return assumptions, percentages) and generates recommendations. The DISCOVER and IMPLEMENT evidence shows the app was built and functional; REFLECT shows meaningful financial interpretation, meeting the standards for a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "I used uh Google AI Studio uh to make this."
"I had to input multiple prompts and customize it um so that I could get graphs and be able to input numbers and get this AI output."
"it will give you three um possible options for um saving and it will tell you which one is the best and it will give you advice."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover — defined the retirement-planner problem and required inputs (age, savings, income).  
Implement — explicitly states using Google AI Studio and multiple prompts to produce numeric outputs, graphs, and text analysis.  
Reflect — comments on risk and realistic adjustments demonstrating evaluation of AI-generated recommendations.
criteria.reasoning: The student shows clear, functional integration of AI (Google AI Studio) that produces both numeric analyses and visualizations and provides scenario-based recommendations, not just superficial labeling. The DISCOVER and IMPLEMENT evidence shows deliberate prompt engineering and output customization, and the REFLECT stage shows critical use of the AI outputs, supporting a thorough, value-adding integration.
